item.title: Application Software
item.description: Application software Application software is the type of software which helps the end user to complete tasks Application software is designed do a specific task in a particular environment

item.title: Driver Software
item.description: Driver software A type software used to control devices plugged into the hardware and operate them. Plugging a mouse

item.title: Features of Application Software
item.description: Features of Application Software Close to the user Easy to design More interactive Generally written in a high-level language

item.title: Features of System Software
item.description: Features of system software Close to the system Difficult to design Difficult to understand

item.title: History of Software
item.description: History of software Ada Augusta Lovelace wrote the first known computer program in 1843 for the Analytical Engine.

item.title: How to Get Software
item.description: How to get software Software can be purchased from a retail computer store or online and it comes in box containing all the disks, manuals, warranty and other documentation

item.title: How to Maintain Software
item.description: How to maintain software After software installation, updates and patches needs to be installed All ways install security updates in time

item.title: Malware
item.description: Malware Malware is software which is designed to act in harmful ways When infected it can make a computer and it’s software misbehave or to stop working completely

item.title: Operating System (OS)
item.description: Operating system (OS) An [[nibm_notes/introduction_to_computer_science/computer_software/operating_system_(OS)|operating system (OS)]] is a software program that serves as the interface between other applications and the hardware on a computer or mobile device

item.title: Popular Software Vendors
item.description: Popular software vendors Microsoft Oracle SAP Sales force Adobe Google

item.title: Programing Software
item.description: Programming software A type of software that isn’t used by the end use It’s used by programmers who are writing code

item.title: Programing Software Used by Programmers
item.description: Programming software used by programmers Compiler Programs that convert the code written by humans into a lower-level form of machine code that's directly interpretable by computer hardware Debugger

item.title: Software Distribution Strategies
item.description: Software distribution strategies Commercial Any program you purchased and got a physical or digital copy of a commercial software.

item.title: Software Examples
item.description: Software examples Word processor Microsoft word Google docs Apple works Spread sheet

item.title: Software Software
item.description: System software System software helps the user, hardware, and application software interact and function with each other System software is a mediator or middle layer between the hardware and the user

item.title: Software Vs Hardware
item.description: Software vs Hardware Computer software and hardware require each other – neither can be used on its own

item.title: Types of Application Software
item.description: Types of application software Word processor Microsoft word Google docs Apple works

item.title: Types of Operating Systems (OS)
item.description: Types of OS Desktop OS Windows Windows is a family of proprietary graphical operating system developed and maintained by Microsoft.

item.title: Types of Systems Software
item.description: Types of system software Basic input/output system (BIOS) The built-in firmware that determines what a computer can do without accessing programs from a disk Boot

item.title: Utility Software
item.description: Utility software Utility software is software designed to help analysis, configure, optimize or maintain a computer. It is used to support the computer infrastructure

item.title: What is Software
item.description: What is software Software is a set of instructions, data, or programs used to operate a computer and execute specific tasks
